page.title: 14Survey on Viewpark Glen
page.content: Our class carried out a survey as part of a project we did on our local 'Glen' which is near to our sch- ool. We made several visits after sch- ool to ask 350 local people about their views on the 'Glen'. Many adults said that they would go back down the Glen if the rubbish and pollution was cleared up. Some were afraid of the vandals and people who go there to drink or carry on. Most felt that the money being spent on it was worthwhile. They hoped that things like good paths and picnic tables and things for child- ren could be made. Some of these will be done soon. Our class helped to plant new trees and we won a competit- ion with our project.
